:theme.description: Theme style, set to 'dark' to enable dark mode, which will take effect globally
:theme.description_zh: 主题风格，设置为 `dark` 来开启深色模式，全局生效

theme-vars.description: Custom topic variables, which take effect locally
theme-vars.description_zh: 自定义主题变量，局部生效

theme-vars-dark.description: Theme variables that only work in dark mode, take precedence over 'theme-vars'
theme-vars-dark.description_zh: 仅在深色模式下生效的主题变量，优先级高于 `theme-vars`

theme-vars-light.description: Theme variables that only work in light mode, take precedence over 'theme-vars'
theme-vars-light.description_zh: 仅在浅色模式下生效的主题变量，优先级高于 `theme-vars`

tag.description: The HTML tag name corresponding to the root node
tag.description_zh: 根节点对应的 HTML 标签名

z-index.description: Set the z-index of all pop-up components, which takes effect globally
z-index.description_zh: 设置所有弹窗类组件的 z-index，该属性对全局生效

icon-prefix.description: The class name prefix of all icons, equivalent to the [class-prefix property] of the Icon component(https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/en-US/icon#props)
icon-prefix.description_zh: 所有图标的类名前缀，等同于 Icon 组件的 [class-prefix 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)
